product_name: Sea to Summit Ultra-Sil Duffel Bag
long_description: The Sea to Summit Ultra-Sil Duffel bag is a lightweight duffel that packs down so small you can carry it on your key ring. Bring it everywhere so you always have a spare bag at hand. Ultra-Sill Duffel has an incredible capacity of 40 liters, weighs only 2.8 oz. and is strong enough to carry a heavy load. Ultra-Sil(R) fabric is lightweight and packable and made with durable YKK(R) zipper. Bar-tacked, reinforced stitching at key stress points. Sea to Summit Ultra-Sil Duffel bag fits snugly in the accompanying stuff sack with a Hypalon(R) key-ring attachment.
short_description: The Sea to Summit Ultra-Sil Duffel bag is a lightweight duffel that packs down so small you can carry it on your key ring. Bring it everywhere so you always have a spare bag at hand.
